name: Spaghetti Bologneses
description: Classic Italian pasta dish with a rich meat sauce.
instructions: Cook the pasta in boiling water. Brown the ground beef in a pan. Add onions, garlic, and tomatoes. Simmer for 20 minutes. Serve the sauce over the cooked pasta.
ingredients: 500g ground beef, 1 onion, 2 cloves of garlic, 400g canned tomatoes, 250g spaghetti, Salt and pepper to taste
